website_summaries.verdict: The Pyle Pro Pinpointer detects objects just below the surface in dirt, sand, and water.
pros: Detects objects up to 3.5 centimeters deep
Marine Grade IP68 construction, waterproof up to 10 meters
Works to find objects buried in dirt, sand, and water
Battery-saver feature powers off unit automatically
cons: Battery does not last very long with this product

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: Pinpointer works great. I like the vibration and light feature, as I am hard of hearing. I have already found several pieces of jewelry, and coins. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to be able to afford a Garrett Carrot or a White's TRX pinpointer but I just can't justify the high prices of those units. After doing a great deal of research and wading through hundreds of reviews, I decide to gamble $49 on this Pyle Pro Pinpointer. I could not be happier! It works beautifully and saves tons of time. The only thing I wish it had is an audible tone but for the price I'm not complaining. Great item at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was fine, new product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on schedule as promised. Packaging was fine, new product. Pinpointed was complete and works fine. Like the indicator lights that indicate closeness of object. I have no problems or issues at all. Thanku.
customer_reviews.author: PaPa Bull

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and works under water just as said
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Works great, and works under water just as said. Definitely recommend this one, for the price you can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A pin pointer is a must have for metal detecting. We've been out with this now four times. It works great for finding coins in soil and sand after you've dug your search hole. The little led light is helpful towards dusk.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description
customer_reviews.text: Product description indicates that this has a built in speaker with audible alert. It does not. It vibrates and has lights. Used it outside for 1 hunt and it was next to useless. Detected nothing unless less than an inch from the tip. I would not recommend this. It's just a child's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Pin Point It
customer_reviews.text: From the best that I can tell it works as good as ones costing as much as 4-times the price, and it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Works very well It helped me find 3 toy cars ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well It helped me find 3 toy cars. This device is for after you get a hit with your metal detector. It helps to find coins in the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Newbie detectorist
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast shipping from Amazon. So just got this pinpointer in one day and have not used it in the field. But playing around with it inside, it picks up everything I have put in front of it. Detection range is is a little closer to object than I expected. But I think it won’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: april d. walker

customer_reviews.title: Dead/junk
customer_reviews.text: Used this for about 6 1hr hunts and it quit on me for absolutely no reason! Can not get it to work again, never abused it in any way, it is fully waterproof and I never had it in water, not sure what’s up but I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: i just received this today. it is easy to handle, and light weight, I am so excited to get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: cissy

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The PMD64 works great, I'm very pleased. Gives good indication from just over an inch away, making pinpointing way easier. Only negative is, needs battery padding in the cap. It was easy to add myself.
customer_reviews.author: James Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not last long as this thing vibrates. It's accuracy is so so.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Metal detecting
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift so not sure how it works yet but I’m sure it will work just fine. I’m a first time metal detector enthusiast. Looking forward to using your product.
customer_reviews.author: Geald Pietricola

customer_reviews.title: Great additional tool for doing metal detecting!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in loose materials to pin point your find!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Leopold

customer_reviews.title: This is a very effective product!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, very sensitive, water tight, everything advertised and more.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Chini

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for price
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I wished it was a little more sensitive to smaller pieces. Still great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lily cheam

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I looked online and you tube no instructions. If I cannot get any I am going to return unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product so I have not used it outside because we just received 20" of snow but compared to my other pinpoiner which was double the price this product has more features and is waterproof and seems just as sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you want it to do and it’s waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a newbie to the metal detector gig but I gotta tell you I don’t know if I’d be doing for long if I didn’t have a good pinpointer. This works great and I haven’t tested the waterproof yet but I have rinsed it off in the faucet and it’s working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: I can already see it will pinpoint my find much better than my metal detector that has its own pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pinpointer and am getting adjusted to it. I can already see it will pinpoint my find much better than my metal detector that has its own pinpointer. Will try at the beach soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome!! Best Pinpointer I have ever owned. Finding all kinds of treasurers!!!
customer_reviews.author: jhaley

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. There is no audible and the vibrate feature does not always work. Also a coin has to be almost on the surface for the led to detect it. Not happy at all. Sorry for the bad review but just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hoefke

product_meta.title: Pyle Pinpointer Metal Detector | Handheld Metal Detector W/ High Sensitivity | Builtin Speakers | Save Battery Automatic Power Off | Low Battery Indicator | Waterproof Marine Grade IP68 (PMD64)
product_meta.description:
Pyle Model : PMD64

METAL DETECTOR PINPOINT LOCATOR
METAL DETECTOR PINPOINT - HANDHELD METAL DETECTOR PINPOINTER
Features:The Perfect Metal Detector AccessoryImproves Metal Detection Locating AbilityWaterproof and Submergible Probe 'Tip'Used for Placement in Ground, Dirt, Sand, Water, etc.Pinpoint Signal Strength LED Indication: 4 Levels Colored LEDsBuilt-in Speaker for Audible Sound Alerts & VibrationAutomatic Power-Off Battery Saving FunctionLow Battery Indication
Technical Specs:Battery Operated: Requires (1) 9V Battery, Not IncludedMarine Grade Rating: IP-68, Safe in Depths up to 10 MetersPinpoint Sensitivity: ~3.5cmStatic Current: ≤20maOperation Frequency: 12±1 kHzDimensions (L x W x H): 10.8 x 2.6 x 2.2 inches
The Pyle Pro Pinpointer Metal Detector is perfect for a day at the beach treasure hunting on both land and sea. This metal detector is Marine Grade waterproof and submersible up to 10 meters. It is easy to use and is sensitive enough to find small covered objects, wherever they may be hiding. Great for beginners - The Perfect Metal Detector Accessory - Improves Metal Detection Locating Ability - Waterproof and Submergible Probe 'Tip' - Used for Placement in Ground, Dirt, Sand, Water, etc. - Pinpoint Signal Strength LED Indication: 4 Levels Colored LEDs - Built-in Speaker for Audible Sound Alerts & Vibration - Automatic Power-Off Battery Saving Function - Low Battery Indication - Technical Specs: - Battery Operated: Requires (1) 9V Battery, Not Included - Marine Grade Rating: IP-68, Safe in Depths up to 10 Meters - Pinpoint Sensitivity: ~3.5cm - Static Current: =20ma - Operation Frequency: 12±1 kHz - Dimensions (L x W x H): 10.8 x 2.6 x 2.2 inches.
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE TREASURE HUNT: Use the Pyle pinpointer metal detector for unearthing hidden objects in dirt, sand & water. Find the treasure with a pinpoint sensitivity of 3.5cm.
EASY OPERATION: The pinpointing metal detector is simple to use and lightweight enough to make it portable and convenient to carry on location hunting.
WATERPROOF: The waterproof pinpointing metal detector features a submersible probe tip. Made of Marine Grade IP68 construction, the metal detector is safe in depths up to 10 meters.
BUILT-IN SPEAKER: The metal pinpointer detector features a built-in speaker for audio sound and vibration alerts. Never miss a lead while on a treasure hunt again!

BATTERY SAVER: When out on long searches the last thing you want is a dead battery. The metal detector pinpointer has an automatic power off battery saving function, as well as a low battery indicator, making sure you are protected.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars66 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
